data.name: Paliac murders
data.desc: Party of Ma, in act of revenge occasioned by Dominican friar Joseph Delgado of Bacalar’s having whipped a Ma king, go on killing spree, which results in 4 Bacalar vecinos and 3 Franciscans dead
data.agents_sp: Francisco de Hariza Arruyo, Diego Martín, Francisco Nuñez, Pablo Xul, Btb Agustín Cholat
data.prim_n: MEXICO,360 [Expediente sobre la muerte de tres religiosos, 1684-87] / MEXICO,312 f 4v-12r, 40v -57r [Expediente sobre misiones a 1696 inc Auto de ruego a 9 ene 1696] / PATRONATO,237,R.8 f 16-22
data.note:
Has = hamlet c 30 [Sp] leagues from Paliac /v Jones 250 / Misit = [presumably] c 8 leagues from Paliac /v Jones 249
 Killed = Friar Joseph Delgado, Friar Marcos de Muros, 2 other friars /v Jones 248
